info.short_description: ◊ê
info.full_description:
Welcome to the ◊ê community!

First, here are the main ideas behind our rules that should be yours:

- The respect of others is primary.
- This instance wants to be peaceful and welcoming.
- Each user is responsible of their account.

Rules of Aleph.land

You can be suspended for:

- Sharing content that is illegal in France (pedophilia, mainly).
- Taking part of a harassment.
- Putting someone in danger.
- Having a racist, sexist, discriminating or oppressive talk.
- Voluntarily degrading the prosperity or the good atmosphere of the instance.

You can be muted from the public timelines for:

- Posting a media, some text or a link to the following contents without an explicit content warning and NSFW cover:
    - nudity (#nude)
    - gore (#gore)
    - pornography (#porn)
    - a flashy media that could be harmful for photosensitive people (#epilepsywarning)
    - spoil (#spoil)
- Unpleasant shitposting or flooding.
- Making abusive ads.
- Posting automatic toots from another source.

Please keep in mind that this rules are here to guarantee a good experience to everyone on the instance. Also, this list is not exhaustive and moderators will do their best to solve problems that may not have been specified here.
If you have any question, or suggestion, don't hesitate to contact me at @Madeorsk@aleph.land! :) 

You can also donate every month to help me to maintain this instance: patreon.com/alephland

info.short_description: Maly is a stable, non-tracking Mastodon instance running along other services like our PeerTube instance and a private cloud.
info.full_description:
Hello ! My name is Tijl Van den Brugghen, named KindlyFire online. I run this Mastodon instance and some other public services for anybody to enjoy. I detailed most information on this page, but feel free to ask me anything !

# Guarantees

* We do not track you. (but others on the Fediverse might, no instance can guarantee this)
* Light moderation. The instance rules are defined below.
* We federate with every instance out there. But that does not say we allow every kind of content.

# Rules

Obviously, every instance has to have rules. Without this, although this instance is pretty small, there would be problems. Here they are:

* Respect everyone
* Do not spam (this applies mainly to bots)
* No NSFW without an appropriete Content-Warning.
* Any kind of illigal content is prohibited.
* Have fun üéâ

More information is available on our about page: https://maly.io/about/more

info.short_description: This is an open mastodon instance for social justice activists, LGBTQIA+ people, and people who are aware of such subjects and care about them.
info.full_description:
The instance has multiple goals, the most important of all being making everyone on here feel as safe as possible. Other goals include letting users manage their social life easily and securely, making this instance a nice community with a shared expression space, and making the fediverse better. 

Right now, the only admin and moderator is @wxcafe. This might change in the future, and will be reflected on this page. Please report any content breaking the rules highlighted on this page using the report function. We don't hesitate to moderate posts, to silence and/or suspend users, local or remote, and instances. In France we like to think of this as "Censure Communautariste".


 This server is run on a server paid for by @wxcafe, hosted on Vultr. The server is a 4GB RAM, 2 vCores, 60G disk VPS. It costs $20/months, and is financed using Patreon
The bot @server_status posts information about the status of the server every once in a while, be it graphs about the ressources, number of users and toots, etc...

info.short_description: A small instance for people who use Free Software and are nice to other people.
info.full_description:
Follow @status for status updates, planned downtimes, etc.

There are no restrictions of content on this instance, however, to keep it pleasant to everyone here are a few rules, which will be completed over time: racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are prohibited and parodic accounts are accepted but must mention they are parodic in their description

Any user not respecting these rules may get silenced or suspended. Also remember you have the ability to report users if they don't respect these rules.

[Adapted from mastodon.xyz terms]

info.short_description: The cutest general purpose safe instance. We love science and beautiful things. LGBT+ and PoC are welcome.
info.full_description:
Octodon.social is a general purpose instance, where topics are mostly technical and scientific, but there's a bit of everything.
Federates with everything, allows nearly everything lawful in France.
Moderation policy is explained in details on our /about/more page; it is a pretty safe space. Harassment, bullying, or hate speech are not tolerated.
As the definition is often forgotten and altered, a safe space is a community where people (especially women, PoC and LGBT+) are protected from oppression and everyday harassment. Our goal is for every member to feel safe and welcome. (but of course that doesn't apply if you break local rules by being aggressive towards someone else, for instance)

info.short_description: Anticapitalist instance. Registrations invite-only. More infos on https://anticapitalist.party/about/more.
info.full_description:
Hello everyone! Basic social rules apply here, and the moderation follows up on each report. Every rule violation can end up in an account suspension.

- In particular, all forms of transphobia, misogyny, homophobia, racism, fat-shaming, ableism, engaging in harrasment, insults, etc are strictly prohibited, and will be dealt with in due course. There is no tolerance on shit like this, accounts are suspended without talking, period.

- anticapitalist.party wasn't designed for sensitive militant operations. Such operations shouldn't be discussed here, and on any other social network.

- Our servers are under French jurisdiction. French laws do apply here. Illegal content will be deleted, and may lead to an account suspension.

- Porn is allowed, with NSFW tag on. Porn without that tag will be deleted.

- Content Warning HAS to be used for the following :
* violence (text and medias)
* stories including *phobias (text and medias)
* sexual content (text and medias)
Please remember to use the NSFW tags for all of the above, are medias are displayed enven with Content Warning on.

- Parody accounts are allowed, and are advised to specify that they are as such in their description or name.

info.short_description: Fast, secure and up-to-date instance, welcoming everyone around the world. Join us!
info.full_description:
Why should you sign up on mstdn.io?

This instance is not focused on any theme or subject, feel free to talk about whatever you want. Although the main language is english, we accept every single language and country.

We're connected to the whole OStatus/ActivityPub fediverse and we do not block any foreign instance nor user.

We do have rules (see below), but the goal is to have responsible users. So far we haven't had any issue with moderation

The instance uses a powerful server to ensure speed and stability, and it has good uptime. We follow state-of-the-art security practices. See below for more technical details

Also, we have over 300 custom emojis to unleash your meming potential üëç

info.short_description: Do you like old hardware ? Do you use them ? Perfect you're welcome here !
info.full_description:
Welcome !
This is an open Mastodon instance, basically.
It's run by the person you see on the right (that's me!) and for now, that's all.
There might be more admins and moderators later if the needs come but alas not yet.

I hope this instance works okay for you, and that you can find a nice and welcoming community here! Feel free to hit me up if you have any questions or requests, be it about this instance, how to make your own instance, or other things not related to Mastodon.

I am actually the only sysadmin of this instance and I can't work full-time on oldbytes.space so, I will do whatever I can in a reasonable time to make it works the best it can.

Rules
This instance has some rules, of course.
First, there are the usual : no sexism, no racism, no hate speech, no LGBTQphobia, no nazis, no spam, no public unflagged porn, etc...
Then, I also believe it's important to remind you that this server was made and is run by a queer activist.
This server thrives to be inclusive, and I will ban without much regret.
People are encouraged to use the report function as they see fit, and can be confident that their complaints will be heard and dealt with in some way. I want everyone to feel safe here, and if that doesn't sound like something you like, you should probably find another server.

There's also a pretty important activism aspect of this instance.
If you're a marketer, a #digital #influencer, this is not the place for you. Not only do I feel you should not feel welcome, I intend to make you feel definitely NOT welcome.
This instance, and this entire social network in my opinion, is dedicated to reclaiming social media, decentralizing, and generally creating better and more engaging communities.
The three categories of people I mentioned earlier are not, in my opinion, working towards this goal, pretty much the opposite, and they are not welcome on this server.
Please report them if you see them.
We also block Nazis, techbros and RMS.

info.short_description: Nodo uruguayo de la red social libre y decentralizada Mastodon. La misma sigue el estandar abierto OStatus, lo que permite interactuar con otras redes
info.full_description:
T√©rminos y Condiciones de Uso

Esta herramienta de comunicaci√≥n est√° en l√≠nea solamente por el esfuerzo de su administrador y, eventualmente, algunas personas que colaboran para que el servicio sea el mejor posible.

Entendemos que para favorecer y promover una buena comunicaci√≥n y convivencia virtual, es necesario establecer algunos criterios o pautas generales. Si alguno de ellos te parece excesivo o no est√°s de acuerdo, siempre puedes elegir alguna otra instancia de Mastodon cuyas normas se adapten mejor a tus principios.

En principio, participar en Mastodon.uy implica comprender y estar de acuerdo con las siguientes condiciones:

No est√° permitido publicar el siguiente contenido (la cuenta ser√° suspendida o eliminada inmediatamente):

    Material que contenga Pornograf√≠a infantil / Pedofilia / Gore / Snuff.
    Contenido NSFW (del ingl√©s Not Safe For Work, No Apropiado Para el Trabajo en castellano), que no sea etiquetado debidamente.
    Contenido Racista / Sexista / Homof√≥bico y cualquier otro que discrimine por cuestiones de g√©nero o de elecciones sexuales.
    Contenido Xenof√≥bico o Nazi.

Advertencia:

Se silenciar√°n (no aparecer√°n en la l√≠nea temporal p√∫blica) las cuentas que publiquen contenido NSFW (no apropiado) sin marcar dichas publicaciones con el bot√≥n de "advertencia de contenido". Figurar en la l√≠nea temporal p√∫blica y federada es un privilegio dado que es un espacio en com√∫n con todos los nodos.

En esta instancia de Mastodon tampoco se tolerar√°n actitudes o acciones de ‚Äúacoso‚Äù a otros usuarios, entendiendo por ‚Äúacoso‚Äù, la persistencia de un usuario por mantener alguna forma de vinculaci√≥n con otro usuario que haya expresado espec√≠ficamente no desear hacerlo.

No se tolerar√° tampoco la publicaci√≥n de contenido o mensajes destinados a molestar o provocar negativamente a otros usuarios con la finalidad de generar altercados o malentendidos intencionalmente (trollear).

No se admite de ninguna forma la publicaci√≥n de informaci√≥n personal de un usuario por parte de otro que no haya autorizado expresamente esa publicaci√≥n.

Este servidor adhiere a los principios del Software Libre y es su esp√≠ritu promoverlos. Ser un nodo m√°s de una red descentralizada y federada que respeta al usuario y no invade su privacidad, es parte de nuestro compromiso militante con esos principios.


Caracter√≠sticas del Servidor

El servidor es un OVZ-5 VPS ubicado en Alemania con las siguientes caracter√≠sticas:

    5120 MB RAM
    5120 MB BURSTRAM (vSwap)
    250 GB Hardware Raid 10
    10 Gbit/s Uplink (Shared)

Estad√≠sticas en https://mastodon.uy/about/more

info.full_description:
This Mastodon instance is for tech workers, academics, students, and others interested in tech who are LGBTQIA+ or Allies.




We're not a free speech absolutist, and there are instances available for that. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech of any sort, which we will define at our sole discretion as moderators.

This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.

info.short_description: Its an unfettered space for Activists. Founded on #4opens, motivated by the #PGA hallmarks and moderated by an ethical code of conduct.
info.full_description:
"We can't engage as communities, unless we have money. I can't even express how angry this makes me." 
- an activist group using Facebook. People and organisations who feel this way are our initial targets.

We are launching two new Mastodon instances for activists and campaigners to aid communication of grassroot groups; putting social media back in our hands by providing a free, unfettered home for campaigners, NGO‚Äôs and activists to communicate among their peers and beyond.

This project is a way out of the restricted, algorithmic, for-profit mediation and commercialisation of communication we increasingly experience. If you do not pay to "boost" each post, a Facebook page will only reach 3-6% of members. This soon becomes an expensive drain on limited NGO and activist budgets. 
Activists and campaigners alike are ready to shift their outreach away from the corporate social networks paid-per-view ‚Äúwalled gardens‚Äù.

Mastodon is the worlds largest free open source decentralised microblogging network; it‚Äôs thousands of unique, interconnected communities, filled with different people, interests, languages, and needs. 
You‚Äôre free to join any community you like, or better yet, host your own, on your own terms. It remains possible for members of each to instance to interact with others. 
There is no monopoly by a single commercial company, no ads, and no tracking.

We aim to help activism/campaigning groups to make this step now.

https://campaign.openworlds.info 
https://activism.openworlds.info
info.topic: Its an unfettered space for Activists and groups to communicate via #openweb projects.

The primary goal is to provide a sense of support and community around plural systems.

Les r√®gles de Eldritch Caf√© sont les suivantes‚ÄØ:
1. Ne participez pas √† du harc√®lement, sous quelque forme que ce soit.

3. Les injures raciales, sexistes ou oppressives en g√©n√©ral vous vaudront d‚Äô√™tre suspendu¬∑e, m√™me utilis√©¬∑e¬∑s dans des conversations non-publiques.

info.short_description: A gathering space for soft friends and allies to share their lives & compassion with each other & the Fediverse! Come see the softer side of Masto. ‚ô•Ô∏è
info.full_description:
‚ú®Plush‚ú® City is a place for soft friends (stuffed animals and other soft toys) and their allies. If you are or have considered being a ‚ú®plush,‚ú® this is the place for you! We're a welcoming and supportive collection of soff frens. ‚ô•Ô∏è 

OUR CODE OF CONDUCT IN A NUTSHELL:

Discrimination & Bigotry Won‚Äôt Be Tolerated.
Leave your hatred at the door.

Treat this Space and Those Within it with Respect.
Listen actively to and honor the requests of others; always respond with compassion first.

Consent is Important in all contexts.
If you‚Äôre ever unsure, ask first.

Listen; Don‚Äôt Make Excuses.
If you‚Äôre accused of causing harm, either take some responsibility or ask moderators for help.

Don‚Äôt Break the Law Here.
The whole space may be liable if you do.

Use the Report Feature.
All reports go straight to our moderation team. We‚Äôre here to help!

info.short_description: Whitespashe.uk is an instance that allows users to post on any topic.
info.full_description:
Code of Conduct

    Mastodon.social guidelines
    JSConf Code of Conduct

The short version

    Don't harass anyone
    If someone is harassing you, report it to a moderator
    Have fun
    Be excellent to each other

Rules

    No advertising or excessive promotion
    No bots, unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.
    No gore or graphic violence
    Content that is NSFW should be put behind a CW (Content Warning)
    No racism
    No sexism
    No discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin
    No xenophobia or violent nationalism
    No sexual depictions of children
    No holocaust denialism, Nazi symbolism, promotion of National Socialism, or anything that is illegal in the European Union
    No stalking or harassment
    No fake accounts, even celebrity joke accounts. Note this rule does not necessarily apply to remote accounts.
    Handling harassment

    If you are being harassed, please report the user using the "‚Ä¶" button and then "Report." For urgent concerns, please DM a moderator.

    If you engage in harassing behavior, the moderator may take any action they deem appropriate, such as a warning or an expulsion.

    The above rules may change at any time, and you may be banned at any time based on the moderators' judgment.
    Privacy policy

    What will we do with your data? Nothing. How will you be influenced by advertisers? You won't; brands and non-humans (other than fun/useful bots) are banned.
    How will we aggregate your data in order to improve your service? We won't.

    We will never share your data with anyone else, except in the case of valid legal requests . Please don't put me in that situation!

    More privacy information:

    Understand that this instance is run by myself, and (as is the case with all Mastodon servers) I potentially have access to your data, including DMs.

    For truly private data sent between two people, Mastodon offers no end-to-end encryption. So use Signal or WhatsApp for the things you really want to be private.

info.short_description: A public, "generalistic" instance run in Germany by the people who run whats-th.is (the file host). All topics and people (even robots) are welcome!
info.full_description:
uwu.social is a public instance hosted on Hetzner's infrastructure in Germany administrated by @dean@uwu.social and @auri@uwu.social, who can also be contacted at devs@whats-th.is. All topics and users (including bots) are welcome on this instance. We also don't block other instances.

The main language of this instance is English, however other languages are welcome. If you don't read/write English, though, you might have a hard time making instance-local friends because of the language barrier so I would recommend signing up on another instance that has lots of users that you can communicate with.

The administrators (Dean and Auri, handles are above) are easy to get a hold of and are friendly. If you come across a problem or would like to request us to change something, feel free to contact us at any time and we'll get back to you when we can. Emoji requests are welcome!

Note: NSFW/pornographic content (text and images) posted on uwu.social that is not tagged (with content warning and/or marked as sensitive) should be reported using the built-in report feature in Mastodon. Please mark your content appropriately.

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance for radio amateurs, DXers and anyone interested to geek out about radio - and just about anything else!
info.full_description:
Welcome !
This is an open Mastodon instance, basically.
It's run by the person you see on the right (that's me!) and for now, that's all.
There might be more admins and moderators later if the needs come but alas not yet.
We runs Mastodon Glitch Edition.

I hope this instance works okay for you, and that you can find a nice and welcoming community here! Feel free to hit me up if you have any questions or requests, be it about this instance, how to make your own instance, or other things not related to Mastodon.

I am actually the only sysadmin of this instance and I can't work full-time on mhz.social so, I will do whatever I can in a reasonable time to make it works the best it can.

Rules
This instance has some rules, of course.
First, there are the usual : no sexism, no racism, no hate speech, no LGBTQphobia, no nazis, no spam, no public unflagged porn, etc...
Then, I also believe it's important to remind you that this server was made and is run by a queer activist.
This server thrives to be inclusive, and I will ban without much regret.
People are encouraged to use the report function as they see fit, and can be confident that their complaints will be heard and dealt with in some way. I want everyone to feel safe here, and if that doesn't sound like something you like, you should probably find another server.

This instance, and this entire social network in my opinion, is dedicated to reclaiming social media, decentralizing, and generally creating better and more engaging communities.


Specs
Currently running on Hetzner Cloud hardware.
One CX21-CEPH with Nginx, Mastodon WEB, Mastodon Sidekiq and Minio as a S3 assets manager endpoint, PostgreSQL and Redis.
Backups are taken one time per day using the dedicated paid option of Hetzner.


Terms
The server is hosted in Nuremberg
The only logs created are the ones from: nginx, mastodon (nodejs, puma web server, sidekiq) and minio (assets).
There is no retention currently in place except the by-default on Debian.

info.short_description: Comfy queer space.
info.full_description:
üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà The best tl;dr for this instance would be ‚Äúcosy queer space‚Äù.

In light of Twitter‚Äôs recently more and more blatant veer towards full-on nazi platforming, and their history of banning queer people and separating us from our support networks for reasons such as ‚Äúbeing suicidal‚Äù, ‚Äúsaying fuck‚Äù and ‚Äúbreathing‚Äù, this place exists as a refuge for those of us who are just tired of it all.

We absolutely will not platform nazis, we will not ban people for reaching out for help from their network, and we will aggressively blacklist users and instances facilitating harassment of our members.

You don‚Äôt have to be queer to sign up for an account, just don‚Äôt be a nazi, and don‚Äôt harass anybody!

info.short_description: A semi-open and 100% friendly community of people who live in and love Philadelphia.
info.full_description:
Welcome to the first mastodon community for Philadelphians who ‚ù§Ô∏èPhiladelphia!

Think of this instance as a new neighborhood in Philly that anyone can be a part of, because it's online.

In order to make sure this community can be home to anyone who wants to participate, we‚Äôve put together a few guidelines.



We expect members‚Ä¶

To take care of themselves, each other, and this place.

Be kind to each other, and to yourself. Encourage others in their endeavors, and respect each other‚Äôs privacy. Treat others with the professionalism, warmth, and respect with which you would like to be treated. Share ideas, organize meet-ups, celebrate successes, help others when you can.

info.full_description: ComicsCamp.Club aims to be a friendly and peaceful home in the Fediverse for all manner of comics and narrative art creators and lovers, whether you're a professional or a fan. It's a place aiming to be as inclusive and supportive as possible of people from varying faiths, sexualities, genders, and backgrounds, and its Code of Conduct will be strictly enforced. Registrations are closed to allow the instance to grow organically through word of mouth, and to keep the community as safe and fun as possible. Invitations are available from @CampCounselor or from any ComicsCamp.Club user.

info.short_description: fandom.ink is designed for fans, fandom, and fandom content creators (fanart, fanfic, fanvids, fan meta).
info.full_description: Inspired by the Great Tumblr Exodus of 2018, fandom.ink is designed for fans, fandom, fandom content creators (fanart, fanfic, fanvids, fan meta), or just people who think the domain name is cool or whatever. As a community, the idea is the recapture the feel of earlier fannish spaces such as pre-Strikethrough LiveJournal, as well as a meatspace fannish conventions. fandom.ink is intended to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion.

info.short_description: INDIEWEB.SOCIAL is a #Mastodon-based Fediverse instance that is a home for those who build, study, promote  - or are just fascinated by - a wide varie
info.full_description:
INDIEWEB.SOCIAL is a #Mastodon-based Fediverse instance that is a home for those who build, study, promote  - or are just fascinated by - a wide variety of #openweb, #indieweb, #federated and #humanetech practices and technologies.

We seek to promote innovation and shared evolution and promotion of such technologies as well as to offer this instance itself as a platform to experiment with integration and early implementations of these.

We will build out here what we hope to see elsewhere: offerings to federate, interoperate, and build bridges to transition in parallel. And to encourage an open, cross platform discussion of how to support and build this together across many diverse projects and technologies.
info.topic: Open web technologies: indieweb, fediverse, self-soverign identity, humane tech design, and related areas.

If you find any vulnerabilities, please report them to @seb@ioc.exchange.
For moderation requests please contact @shib@ioc.exchange or @seb@ioc.exchange.

info.short_description: L'istanza generalista italiana, Mastodon.uno √® il primo social italiano indipendente generalista, etico, libero, senza fini commerciali e politici.
info.full_description:
Siamo la prima community italiana ad essere consigliata dal sito ufficiale di mastodon in quanto seguiamo rigidi criteri di affidabilit√† fra cui: backup giornalieri, pi√π di un responsabile tecnico disponibile in caso di emergenza, garanzie tecniche nel mantenere il sito sempre online, moderazione attiva contro azioni discrimitorie e di odio, nessuno scopo commerciale. 
Mastodon.uno √® inoltre una delle poche istanze in cui √® attiva la ricerca sul testo sullo storico dei toot scritti, ogni utente ha la possibilit√† di cercare nel proprio archivio per poter ritrovare informazioni utili scritte o con cui si √® interagito in passato, purtroppo questa fondamentale funzione di ricerca √® disattivata nella maggior parte delle istanze per risparmiare sui costi, noi forniamo un servizio completo per mantenere una memoria storica su ci√≤ che gli iscritti scrivono, vogliamo che tutti possano facilmente recuperare in qualsiasi momento ci√≤ che √® di loro propriet√† e rendiamo facilmente accessibile i contenuti di ogni utente che possono essere ritrovati con una semplice ricerca con parole chiave.

info.short_description: Willkommen in der digitalen Darmst√§dter Nachbarschaft aus dem Rhein-Main-Gebiet - komm doch mal auf einen Kaffee vorbei!
info.full_description: Diese Plattform bringt Darmstadt und Umgebung zusammen und ist zugleich ein Tor zur Welt. Nutze Hashtags wie #freeyourstuff oder #foodsharing, die erst in deiner Nachbarschaft ihren wahren Wert entfalten. Vernetze dich in deiner Umgebung um mit Menschen zusammen zu kommen, die du auch im echten Leben einfach auf einen Kaffee treffen kannst. Besch√§ftige dich mit Themen und Menschen die dir nahe stehen - im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes. Schaffe dir ein lokales Netzwerk. Das alles mit Blick auf Gemeinn√ºtzigkeit, Privatsph√§re sowie neusten Technik und Ethik-Standards.

[ENG] We are musicians,music lovers
info.full_description:
[ITA]
Siamo un gruppo di lavoro di musicisti, appassionati di musica. Facciamo parte di centri sociali, esperienze sociali autogestite. Utilizziamo questa istanza per scambiarci musica, opinioni, informazioni su strumenti software e hardware per produrre musica.
Siamo convinti che slegare la diffusione di musica da logiche competitive, possa favorire il fare comunit√†, quindi un maggiore e pi√π sincero scambio di informazioni.
[ENG]
We are musicians, music lovers. We are part of social centers, self-managed social experiences. We use this instance to exchange music, opinions, information on software and hardware tools to produce music.
We are convinced that untying the diffusion of music from competitive logics can favor making communities, therefore a greater and more sincere exchange of information.

info.short_description: This is an official mastodon instance for activists of the global climate justice and social justice movement.
info.full_description:
Golden Rules

1. Follow the code of conduct below.
2. Please report abusive behavior, spam, trolling and illegal stuff.
3. The service is free, but runs on donations. If there are not enough donations I'll have to close registrations.
4. This instance is for activists and the main theme is climate justice. It doesn't have to be your main field of activism, but you should post about the climate every once in a while.
5. The instance is not open for bots or accounts that mainly repost tweets or posts from other sites.
Code of Conduct

The following guidelines are based on thosevfrom mastodon.social and are not a legal document. The final interpretation is up to the administration of climatejustice.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

Excessive advertising
Bots
Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

Racism or advocation of racism
Sexism or advocation of sexism
Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

Sexual depictions of children
Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.
Donations
Info about donations will follow

info.short_description: Todon.eu is a radical leftist anti-authoritarian Mastodon server. We welcome anarchists, socialists, activists, the LGBTQIA+ community, etc.
info.full_description:
English:

Todon.eu is a radical leftist anti-authoritarian Mastodon server. We welcome anarchists, socialists, activists, the LGBTQIA+ community, environmentalists, anti-racists, anti-fascists, anti-capitalists, intersectionalists, vegans, pirates, human rights activists, etc. As far as they are radical, leftist √°nd anti-authoritarian.

Deutsch:

Todon.eu ist ein linksradikaler, antiautorit√§rer Mastodon-Server. Wir hei√üen Anarchist_innen, Sozialist_innen, Aktivist_innen, die LGBTQIA+-Gemeinschaft, Umweltbewegung, Antirassist_innen, Antifaschist_innen, Antikapitalist_innen, Intersektionalist_innen, Veganer_innen, Pirat_innen, Menschenrechtler_innen, etc. willkommen. Solange sie radikal, links √∫nd antiautorit√§r sind.

Espa√±ol:

Todon.eu es un servidor de Mastodon de izquierda radical antiautoritaria. Damos la bienvenida a anarquistas, socialistas, activistas, personas del colectivo LGBTQIA+, ambientalistas, anti-racistas, anti-fascistas, anti-capitalistas, interseccionalistas, veganxs, piratas, activistas por los derechos humanos, etc. Siempre que sean radicales, de izquierdas y antiautoritarios.

Nederlands:

Todon.eu is een radicaal linkse anti-autoritaire Mastodonserver. Wij verwelkomen anarchisten, socialisten, activisten, de LHBTQIA+-community, de milieubeweging, intersectionelen, antiracisten, antifascisten, antikapitalisten, veganisten, piraten, mensenrechtenactivisten, enz. Als ze maar radicaal, links √©n anti-autoritair zijn.

More:

See https://todon.eu/about/more for more information in above languages, and links to machine translations in even more languages, our privacy police and of course our Terms of Service.

info.short_description: Instance g√©n√©raliste ouverte √† toutes et tous.
info.full_description:
POURQUOI TOOTER ?

Les r√©seaux sociaux mainstreams, du moins ce qu'il en reste, ont tu√© le partage et la communication. C'est en partant de ce constat que j'ai d√©cid√© de monter mes propres instances Mastodon et Peertube. Elles ont pour but de cr√©er des espaces fiables sur la dur√©e, en petit commit√©, dans un √©tat d'esprit d'√©coute et de respect de l'autre.


MOD√âRATION

Du fait des valeurs port√©es par l'instance, les propos porteurs d'intol√©rance, de haine, et la diffusion d'informations inv√©rifiables pourront entrainer une suppression de compte.

Aussi, ne sont pas accept√©s ici les comptes de repr√©sentants d'entreprises pratiquant l'√©vasion ou l'optimisation fiscale. Dans un esprit d'opposition au syst√®me n√©olib√©ral en place et de lutte contre la destruction de la plan√®te, l‚Äôapologie √† la consommation de masse pourra elle aussi entrainer une suppression de compte.

La nudit√© et la sexualit√© sont accept√©es sous condition d'utiliser le Content Warning.

 
CGU
Hormis celles cit√©es pr√©c√©demment, l'instance n'a pas de r√®gles sp√©cifiques. Le droit fran√ßais et europ√©en s'applique ici.

 
H√âBERGEMENT & FINANCEMENT
Tooter est h√©berg√© sur un CX11 chez Hetzner. Le nom de domaine est d√©pos√© chez OVH.
Je finance ces services avec mon RSA. Vous pouvez m'apporter un soutien financier bienvenu via Liberapay.

 
BIENVENUE !
Si vous vous retrouvez dans ces quelques paragraphes, alors vous vous sentirez √† votre aise sur cette instance. En vous souhaitant la bienvenue !

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance specially created for crypto, information and cyber security minded people!
info.full_description:
Code of Conduct
The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of shitcoin.land; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
a. Excessive advertising
b. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
c. Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
d. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions

2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
a. Racism or advocation of racism
b. Sexism or advocation of sexism
c. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
d. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
a. Sexual depictions of children
b. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
c. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
a. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
b. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
c. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Requirements for sign up
Your primary Twitter account must be shared when signing up and the account must have been created before 2018.
A tweet with the username you have picked for the registration.

Limit for sign ups
As for now we will limit the sign ups to 100 users.

info.full_description:
Subversive.Zone hat das Ziel, eine √ºberwiegend deutschsprachige Mastodoninstanz f√ºr Menschen mit emanzipatorischem Anspruch zu sein. Wir m√∂chten nicht ‚Äûdie eine Instanz‚Äú sein, sondern sehen uns als Teil eines losen Netzwerks mit anderen emanzipatorischen und antiautorit√§ten Instanzen.

Emanzipatorische Werte wollen wir bereits jetzt aktiv leben, anstatt darauf zu warten, dass sie sich mit ‚Äûder Revolution oder dem Ende des Kapitalismus‚Äú schon von selbst einstellen und sie bis dahin unterzuordnen.

Wir legen einen Fokus auf Zug√§nglichkeit und nutzen die Werkzeuge, die Mastodon hierf√ºr bereitstellt, wie Bildbeschreibungen und Inhaltswarnungen.

Weiterhin dulden wir keine Transfeindlichkeit und Sexarbeiter:innenfeindlichkeit sowie kein Eintreten f√ºr Autoritarismus, Nationalismus oder Antisemitismus.

info.short_description: PeopleMaking.Games is an invite-only, organic growth instance for all of the wonderful folks in and around games.
info.full_description:
We're building a community that celebrates games and the craft of creating interactive experiences. It's a space to play together, share with each other, learn new things, build connections, and help one other grow! We take the broad view of the term "Game Maker". Whether you're in games or around them, fresh faced or veteran, digital or physical, this is a space for you, a home in the Fediverse!

Our instance is invite only, to facilitate organic growth. The hope is that, by letting friends invite friends, we can maintain a positive and supportive culture with strong connections between each and every member. If you know somebody who's already on the server, consider reaching out to them! Don't know anyone but feel like this is a place you'd like to be a part of? Introduce yourself from another instance!
info.topic: General chat with a shared interest in interactive experiences and the craft of making them

info.short_description: We offer free software for you and all the people you love. We do this transparently and democratically.
info.full_description:
We are a non-registered association seated in Cologne, Germany. Our goal is to enable more people to use free software, have secure digital communications, and to take control over their private data. We offer free software for you and all the people you love. We do this transparently and democratically.

We currently have four larger projects:

    Matrix: a decentralized, end-to-end encrypted chat, similar to Slack or Discord.
    Mastodon: a decentralized microblogging platform, similar to Twitter.
    Nextcloud: a cloud with office capabilities, similar to the Google Suite and Microsoft Office 365.
    PubSolarOS, a GNU+Linux Distribution that is based on NixOS

Our Mastodon and Matrix instances are publicly open for registration. If you (or your non profit, or your family) would like to use our Nextcloud, send us a message.

info.short_description: A place for the helpful discussions that happen in our hallways, sometimes happened on Twitter, and never on the ASA communications "platform".
info.full_description:
a community site for social scientists. It's a place for the helpful discussions that happen in our hallways, sometimes happened on Twitter, and never happen on whatever the ASA "communications platform" is. Membership on this server is gently restricted to folks who are social scientists. Right now that includes anyone who has an .edu email address and is a professor or grad student in a social science department.

Use sciences.social to

  • Post about interesting research including your own
  • Ask for help
  • Get advice on syllabi
  • Other activities you think make sense

sciences.social runs on mastodon, a free, open source, "twitter-like" platform with no advertising. You can use both this website and any compliant app to access your account here (I use the mastodon app). The site is part of the "fediverse" which means you can follow folks here with if you have an account on another server that runs mastodon or a compatible system, and if you have an account here, you can follow folks elsewhere, just like you can exchange email with people on other servers. The nice thing about having an account here, in particular, is it makes it easy for us to find each other and we can have moderation policies that make sense.

sciences.social is currently funded by me, Mark Igra (@markigra), a PhD student who earned enough money to pay for this site in a previous career. I'll fund it for at least a year and after that as long as there are 100 or more active users. I've started a first cut of rules, but if this site gains any traction I would love to come up with a reasonable governance system that doesn't depend on me exclusively, and isn't subject to a single person's whims. (However whimsical(?) my whims might be). Let me know if you have any interest in helping out.

The current header image is a public domain visualization from W.E.B. Du Bois exhibit at the 1900 Paris Exhibition. Expect changing visualizations over time

info.short_description: A place for communities in and around Chicago, IL or people who plan to visit!
info.full_description:
CityOfChicago.Live is a decentralised, free and open alternative to Twitter based on Mastodon. Part of the Fediverse
Code of Conduct
The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of CityOfChicago.live; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
Excessive advertising
Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
Racism or advocation of racism
Sexism or advocation of sexism
Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
Sexual depictions of children
Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.
These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

info.full_description: This server will never be bigger than 100 people. That said, as long as the applications are open, we still have room. If you think you'd feel at home here, please apply! A note from the admin: I'd like Club Unstraight to be a kind place, and you can't be kind without being vulnerable. During the application process you will be asked to introduce the person and the passion. You introduce the person by writing about three events that shaped you into the person you are today, and the passion by writing about things you'd like to discuss. Each answer should be max 500 characters, as these will be your pinned introduction toots.

    Les contenus pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent √™tre marqu√©s avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette r√®gle seront supprim√©s
    La publicit√©, sous forme r√©p√©t√©e et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur¬∑ices), n'est pas accept√©e. Les comptes concern√©s seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et f√©d√©r√©s, ou supprim√©s, selon la gravit√© de la situation.
    Approchez les personnes avec pr√©caution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arr√™ter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer √† une discussion, arr√™tez imm√©diatement.
    Sont interdits les propos, images ou vid√©os racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
    Sont interdits les avances ou propositions √† caract√®res sexuels non-sollicit√©es.
    Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en priv√©, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
    Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, diss√©miner les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.
    Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne √† poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant r√©clam√© la cessation de ladite interaction peut √™tre consid√©r√© comme du harc√®lement, ind√©pendamment de la confidentialit√© employ√©e.
    Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d‚Äôune oppression syst√©mique. Par exemple : ¬´ racisme anti-blanc ¬ª, ¬´ sexisme anti-homme ¬ª, ¬´ h√©t√©rophobie ¬ª, ¬´ cisphobie ¬ª.
    Il est interdit publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute d√©sinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autoris√©s). Les profils satiriques doivent √™tre indiqu√©s comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

info.short_description: A base for like-minded progressive folks to land in the #TwitterMigration: people who believe in liberation, racial justice, and structural change.
info.full_description:
This is a home for relatively like-minded folks to land in the #TwitterMigration. Likeminded, how? In the middle of the pandemic in 2020, many were ready to admit that the systems running our world ==> are systems running humans (and this planet) into the ground. If you had that moment of reflection, the PostPandemicParty might be the homebase for you to land in.

If recognize that the society you live in was formed in the image of white supremacy, and is still steeped in it, then this might be the homebase for you.

If you believe a multi-racial, multi-ethnic democracy is ‚Äòa more perfect union‚Äô that we were dedicated to form, that this is possible, that #BlackLivesMatter, that you're standing on #NativeLand, then this might be the homebase for you.

If you believe in liberation rather than charity or philanthropy, and would support oppressed people to lead the way to achieve their liberation, then this might be for you.

If you're sick and tired of racism, settler colonialism, misogyny, religious extremism, homophobia, transphobia, nationalism, anti-semitism, xenophobia, and of being sick and tired, this might be the place for you.

If you strive in your work to leave a better planet than you inherited, even if you know that the institution/corporation/academy where you work is steeped in a history of these oppressions, this might be for you.

If you're a human who believes in things like the above but also sometimes makes a human mistake, has messed up on a person's pronouns, said something ableist, or been called-in for an implicit bias you never examined before... and you are OK with becoming a better person and self-aware enough to learn from experiences, you might be home.

If you grapple with these contradictions, because the human condition is messy, welcome.

On this instance you might find professors, scholars, educators, digital humanists, feminists, cartographers, designers, feminist cartographers and designers, archivists, librarians, artists, activists, artist-activists, creative coders, public historians, museum professionals, organizers, human rights lawyers, journalists, archeologists, and a hundred other careers that people can hold. They might post about their projects, they might post links, they might post cute dog pics/cat pics/chinchilla pics, or they might post about a heck of a day they are having. There's no suggested "on-topic".

info.short_description: Face and discuss the climate crisis and the general state of the world without going insane.
info.full_description:
Mastodon server for people who feel concerned about the state of the world but would like to write about general topics too to keep their sanity.

This is a service that provides a Mastodon instance primarily for people who feel concerned about the climate crisis and the state of the world in general but would like to discuss general topics too to keep their sanity. Concerned about the climate, authoritarianism, war, billionaires and the power of big tech ‚Äì but still looking for a community that posts about less scary things too? This is for you.

You are welcome to join us if the following resonates with you:

- Let's explore how to change the way our society works to avoid climate breakdown as much as possible.
- In order not to go insane, let's talk about more the pleasant things in life too.
- Humor is important!
- We welcome and cherish criticism and challenges to our beliefs. However, we do not tolerate the intolerant. Hate and violence are not welcome here.

info.short_description: Cultivating a new network of networks, the FEDERATE.SOCIAL community seeks to remake new social media alternatives and return to the internet's defaul
info.full_description:
If you‚Äôve watched The Great Hack on Netflix, then perhaps you‚Äôve changed your relationship to social media in the last few years. I launched the federate.social server in the aftermath of the leveraged buyout of Twitter realizing that centralized platforms have fundamental flaws.

Re-decentralization is a response to the ways in which the scale of dominant platforms serves as both as its primary feature and its fundamental flaw that cannot be debugged. Federation offers an alternative model to rebuild social media into a network of networks that more closely resembles the original designs of the pre-commercialized internet.

The nature of a network of networks not only inhibits unmanageable scale, but also incentivizes servers to enforce conduct that sustains its position in the federation. People have to choose servers that align with their own values. In that way, federate.social begins by espousing the values of the founder. But we hope that a new membership forms and collaboratively develops the conduct and culture of the community we want to see cultivated.

We ask you to:
Slow down. We've been conditioned to demand immediate and constant stimulation and gratification. Building a new world will take time, work, and patience, but it will be more rewarding. Think of this more like planting a garden than simply replacing what you are already conditioned to expect.
Experiment. We've been conditioned to accept whatever big platforms deign is in their best interest. We need a place to design other ways of imagining how to engage together online.
Engage collegially. We hope you'll experience the liberation of communicating without the pressures of harvesting engagement and attention. Instead, if you've been around long enough, you might remember what the internet used to feel like before big platforms dominated our experiences.

info.short_description: Communaut√© francophone de d√©veloppeurs et d√©veloppeuses de jeux.
info.full_description:
Bienvenue dans la communaut√© Mastodon francophone des d√©veloppeurs et d√©veloppeuses de jeux !

De quoi peut-on parler sur ce serveur ?

Si le sujet qui nous r√©unit tous et toutes est bien le d√©veloppement de jeux, nous sommes avant tout une communaut√© √† taille humaine ! Vous pouvez √©galement nous parler de votre animal de compagnie ou d'un sujet d'actualit√©. Cela rendra le fil local plus vivant et int√©ressant !
En cas de doute, utilisez votre bon sens : si vous pensez que vos posts sont trop fr√©quents et n'ont pas toujours leur place sur le fil local du serveur, choisissez l'option Non list√© lorsque vous postez. Ainsi, vos abonn√©s verront votre post mais il n'appara√Ætra pas dans le fil local !

A propos de l'h√©bergeur

Ce serveur Mastodon est h√©berg√© par Game Dev Alliance, une communaut√© francophone de d√©veloppeuses et d√©veloppeurs ind√©pendants. Nous proposons des √©v√©nements et des formations gratuites pour d√©buter dans la cr√©ation de jeux.
Nous avons pour habitude de distribuer nos sites et autres projets gratuitement et en open source. Les membres de l'√©quipe financent les projets gr√¢ce √† leurs √©conomies personnelles et les dons de la communaut√© via le bouton Rejoindre de la cha√Æne YouTube.
Vous pouvez √©galement discuter avec la communaut√© sur notre forum Discord, visiter notre compte YouTube et lire nos tutoriels sur FaireDesJeux.fr.

info.short_description: Sharing your thoughts has never been more convenient. Publish anything you want: links, pictures, text, video.
info.full_description:
Social networking, back in your hands!

Sharing your thoughts has never been more convenient. Publish anything you want: links, pictures, text, video. All on a platform that is community-owned and ad-free.

You have 500 characters. You can adjust the thumbnails of your pictures with focal points. You can use custom emojis, hide things behind spoiler warnings and choose who sees a given post. Messed it up? You can delete & redraft for quick corrections.

Without an incentive to sell you things, Mastodon allows you to consume content you enjoy uninterrupted. Your feed is chronological, ad-free and non-algorithmic‚Äîyou decide who you want to see!

info.short_description: Just one of many Mastodon servers. We don't have specific topics. Mainly German and English. Data location is Germany.
info.full_description:
-Reporting abuses-

Please report any server rule violations and provide further input if applicable. We'll handle your report asap.
Note that not all actions may be visible to you. We take every report seriously.


-Server and data location-

This server is located in EU, Germany - so is it's data. No data (except for federation parts) is leaving Germany.


-Reliability-

We're aiming a server uptime of 100%. But let's be real, you should more expect a uptime throughout the year of 99,9%. The reason is simple: We may have issues in the data center that are out of our scope or we have to apply security updates.

We'll notify you on required maintenances 24 hours before hand if possible.

If we should decide to drop this Mastodon server from our services, please note that we will notify you 3 months up front. This should give you enough time to migrate your data.


-Moderation-

Trending based information are moderated and reviewed up front. We're aiming to keep our trending safe for work environments.

While free speech is important, please note that -based on our server rules- we're moderating this server. If you're not happy with our rules, please consider another Mastodon server.

info.short_description: Fediverse home of socialist teeth. 18+ instance.
info.full_description:
Friendly neighborhood cat here to give you some information on the vibe of this instance if you were interested on signing up. We're a general interest instance mostly consisting of queer folk who enjoy a quieter space than the bigger instances. We've been around since 2018, and have created a welcoming community of a few people. You won't feel like a wallflower here.

The people here mostly talk about video games, movies and tv shows of all types, but you'll find a wide variety of stuff being talked about. We're a diverse group with diverse interests. We'll talk about almost anything.

The instance is run by one person, who handles all moderation. The moderation approach is very loose and focuses more on users using the tools mastodon gives you to curate your feed yourselves. The admin keeps the timelines clean of egregious content that doesn't mesh with his worldview, but typically doesn't get involved with interpersonal issues unless there's clear signs of harassment or abuse.

The instance does require approval, but mostly just to keep bots from making accounts. We're open and accepting anybody, just give the admin a bit to see your request. I'm as prompt as I can be.

info.full_description:
Toot.Garden is a Mastodon server that is meant for the casual gamers, artists, and those with creative minds. Many casual games such as Celeste, Stardew Valley, Minecraft, and more- promote creativity, and oftentimes like minds attract each other. Whether you are an artist, computer programmer, game designer, or anything else, you should feel at home here. This should be your place to grow, connect, and share! That's the goal anyway!

The beauty of Mastodon is it allows for server owners, and their communities to moderate and curate content as they wish. This server is not a place for racism, antisemitism, homophobia, transphobia, or alt-right thinking/discourse. Should activities, posting, or otherwise be infringing upon this, a swift ban will be placed upon the infringing account.

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance for all who pursue the journalistic ethic.
info.full_description:
By joining this Mastodon instance, you agree to embody the four foundational principles of ethical journalism from the SPJ Code of Ethics:

1. Seek truth and report it: Ethical Journalism should be accurate and fair. Ethical journalists should be honest and courageous in gathering, reporting and interpreting information.
2. Minimize harm: Ethical journalism treats sources, subjects, colleagues and members of the public as human beings deserving of respect.
3. Act independently: The highest and primary obligation of ethical journalism is to serve the public.
4. Be accountable: Ethical journalism means taking responsibility for one's work and explaining one's decisions to the public.

See the following link to learn more: https://www.spj.org/ethicscode.asp

info.short_description: A small place for the geeky & nerdy green thumb hobbyists of the world. And Cats.
info.full_description:
Welcome to Growers Social!
This server was primarily set up to be a home for all green thumbs. While we would love to welcome anyone with a green thumb hobby, we unfortunately will be limiting registrations for the time being.

When attempting to register please list the reason you would like to join this specific instance that pertains to growing things.

E-mails may be delayed when registering, if need be try to resend them as needed. This domain is still "fresh & new".

We are a social group that is like-minded, don't feel as though all posts have to be about what you grow. Rather we want to create a small tight-knit community full of social interactions. In addition to grown items please feel free to share your daily life, interesting technologies, pets & animals, and anything that makes you, well you.

Code of Conduct
This document lays out the ground rules for participating in the growers.social community. It is intended to protect all members of our community from harassment and to ensure that our community is as welcoming and inclusive as possible. This is a working document, so the growers.social team may amend this CoC to better meet these goals in the future.

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and the final interpretation is up to the administration of growers.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
Excessive advertising
Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
Untagged nudity, pornography, and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
Fake news, anti-vaccination spam
The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
Racism or advocation of racism
Sexism or advocation of sexism
Casteism or advocation of casteism
Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
Sexual depictions of children
Content illegal in the United States
Any holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, impede other users from utilizing the service, degrade the performance of the service, harass other users, or incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person‚Äôs demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.
These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user‚Äôs access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Goals
Provide a friendly, safe, and welcoming environment for everyone, regardless of the level of experience, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, nationality, political affiliation, or other similar characteristics.
Create a supportive community, where people freely share their passions and are excited and positive about each other‚Äôs successes.
Provide a venue for casual conversations.
Non-Goals
While it‚Äôs important to know what growers.social is, it‚Äôs just as important to understand what we‚Äôre not. growers.social is not:

A free speech zone. growers.social is a community with specific ‚Äî and high ‚Äî standards of behavior. If you would like to exercise your full free speech rights, you can do so somewhere else; while on growers.social, you should agree to follow the community rules set out in this CoC.
An advocacy space. There are many important, controversial, and political issues; and advocating for what you believe is important. However, growers.social is not the place for that advocacy. Even correct views can violate our CoC.

Reporting Volations
If you notice a toot that violates this code of conduct, please report it. It is easy to assume that someone else has already reported a toot, but it is easy for everyone to feel that way and no one to report the toot.

info.short_description: Just a small server for furries into tech, games, leftish politics, animals, photography, home automation, and tigers!
info.full_description:
Tiggi.es is for furries, folks interested in:
* Tech, computers, gaming, both retro and current 
* Cooking and Good food
* Travel, cars, and driving
* Photography
* Big guys! 
* And of course, tigers.  

But really it's about sharing experiences and keeping things as Musk-free as possible.  Tiggies is an LGBTQIA+ Alphabet Mafia-supportive and celebrating server.

For those interested in the tech, Tiggi.es is run on a 3 node cluster consisting of:

* 2x HP Elite 800 G9/i7-12700t with 64GB DDR5, 2x 2TB high write endurance PCIE 4.0 NVMe/3.84TB Enterprise SATA SSD
* 1 HP Elite 600 G6/i9-10900t with 64GB DDR4, 2x 2TB high write endurance 
PCIE 3.0 NVMe/3.84TB Enterprise SATA SSD

All running ProxMox Virtual Environment with replication and nightly backups to both RAID-6 and LTO-5.  Connection is 5GBit Fiber.  Located in Pflugerville, TX (Austin area)

Hier soll sich jeder ausleben zu k√∂nnen, ohne von anderen auf welche Arten auch immer diskriminiert zu werden. 

Desweiteren ist diese Instanz nicht nur in der Orga non-kommerziell, sondern auch kommerzielle Werbung ist hier nicht gerne gesehen.

info.short_description: The next-generation Mastodon instance for all things technology
info.full_description:
# Welcome to Technodon!

### What is Mastodon?

Mastodon is a de-centralized social network that allows individuals to engage in communities with special interests and it has led to a coalition of "town squares" / "watering holes" where individuals gather to discuss their topics of interest. This has not only facilitated micro-engagement (using Local timelines) but also macro-engagement (as part of the Federated timeline / #Fediverse), adding more value and purpose to conversations. Unlike other social networks that pretend to be the beholder of "free speech" and giving "Power to the people", Mastodon truly gives power to the people by increasing transparency and community moderation. It does this through it's Open Source source code and de-centralization.

### What is Technodon?

Technodon is a Mastodon instance (town square / watering hole) for technology enthusiasts and professionals. The goal of this instance is to provide a space for technologists to share their work, innovation and potentially connect with other like-minded individuals.

### Server Information

This server is hosted in **New York City, NY, USA** through *Digital Ocean*. 

- `Server Type` Basic Droplet
- `CPU` 2 vCPUs
- `Memory` 2GB
- `Storage` 60GB


### Support the community

Since we do not serve ads and we do not sell data we rely on your support. If you like you can donate to help us out a little. You can find a find a complete overview of our costs and donations on mstdn.social hub

You can help out the community by donating in several ways:

* Become a Patron
* Support via PayPal    
* OpenCollective Backers

(Links to :point_up: will be shared shortly)

### Attributions

https://technodon.social uses the main Mastodon code base from https://github.com/mastodon/mastodon.

Hosted by R2 Consulting (https://www.r2c.io) - an ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 certified company

### What to do about self-harm and suicide concerns on Mastodon?

 If you or someone you know is struggling or in crisis, you‚Äôre not alone. Use the contact info below to get help.

* **United States**: Contact the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-TALK (8255). Crisis workers are available 24 hours a day. Calls are free and confidential.
* **Other countries & regions**: To find a crisis center near you, visit International Association for Suicide Prevention (https://findahelpline.com/i/iasp).

If you or someone you know is thinking about engaging in self-harm or suicidal behavior, you should seek help as soon as possible by contacting services with expertise in crisis intervention and suicide prevention.

Das Moderatorenteam beh√§lt sich das Recht vor, Inhalte, die gegen eine freie, friedliche und tolerante Diskussion stehen, zu L√∂schen. Der Autor der Nachrichten wird dar√ºber durch die Software benachrichtigt.

Meldungen

info.short_description:
Unser Verein stellt eine Plattform f√ºr Vereine zur Verf√ºgung.
Austausch und Netzwerkbildung der neuen Generation.
info.full_description:
Verhaltenscodex
Dieses Dokument ist die Grundlage f√ºr die Teilnahme an der vereine.social Community und wird mit dem Erstellen eines Accounts akzeptiert. Es ist dazu gedacht, alle Mitglieder dieser Community vor Bel√§stigung zu sch√ºtzen und sicherzustellen, dass unsere Community so inklusiv wie m√∂glich bleibt. Das vereine.social Team nimmt sich die Freiheit heraus, das Dokument an die Gegebenheiten anzupassen.

Ziele
- Biete allen eine freundliche, sichere und inklusive Umgebung, unabh√§ngig von Wissensstand, Gender-Identit√§t, sexueller Orientierung, Beeintr√§chtigung, Erscheinungsbild, K√∂rpergr√∂√üe, Ethnizit√§t, Alter, religi√∂ser Zugeh√∂rigkeit, Nationalit√§t, politischer Orientierung, oder anderer √§hnlicher Charakteristika.
- Biete eine unterst√ºtzende Umgebung, in der sich alle Menschen ihrer Passion hingeben k√∂nnen und sich positiv mit anderen √ºber Freud und Leid des Lebens austauschen k√∂nnen.
- Biete einen Ort f√ºr lockere Gespr√§che ‚Äî wir sind alle Teil der Vereinswelt, was aber nicht bedeutet, dass es ausschlie√ülich um Vereinsthemen gehen muss.
- Komme zusammen mit deiner Nachbarschaft. Diese Instanz wird in erster Linie von Vereinen f√ºr Vereine betrieben. Menschen sollen sich √ºber diese Plattform kennenlernen, treffen und zusammen etwas in der Vereinslandschaft bewegen k√∂nnen.

Anti-Ziele
W√§hrend es wichtig ist, zu wissen, was vereine.social ist, ist es genauso wichtig zu wissen, was nicht. vereine.social ist nicht:
- Eine Zone freier Meinungs√§u√üerung. vereine.social ist eine Community mit bestimmten ‚Äî und hohen ‚Äî Verhaltensstandards. M√∂chtest Du von deinem vollst√§ndigen Recht auf freie Meinungs√§u√üerung gebrauch machen, kannst Du das gerne woanders tun; Solange Du auf vereine.social unterwegs bist, solltest Du die Regeln dieses Codex beachten.
- Eine Nur-Vereine Zone. Die Vereinswelt ist spannend und abwechslungsreich und dennoch hat jeder von uns auch private Interessen. Im Rahmen der Communityregeln d√ºrft ihr diese hier auch kommunizieren.

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance for SRE/DevOps/Systems Engineers/Administrators.
info.full_description:
# About this Instance
A Mastodon instance for SRE/DevOps/Systems Engineers/Administrators.

# Attributions
This instance has a number of emotes from Twitch Interactive. These emotes are property of Twitch Interactive.

# Code of Conduct
## Short Version
We try to handle moderation ASAP, but we may not see reports for several hours. We will get to all reports though!

We're not a free speech absolutist instance, and there are instances available for that. We're not interested in hate speech of any sort, which we will define at our sole discretion as moderators. No homophobia, transphobia, queerphobia, racism allowed.

Please keep in mind that your actions reflect upon the whole server. It takes no effort to be kind.

## Long Version
Borrowed and modified from the tech.lgbt instance information

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of sysad.ninja; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
  1. Excessive advertising
  2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
  3. Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions. These should be marked as sensitive and with a CW. See below.
  4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions. These should be marked as sensitive and with a CW. See below.
2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
  1. Racism or advocation of racism
  2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
  3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
  4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
  1. Sexual depictions of children
  2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France
  3. Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
  4. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
  1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
  2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
  3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

# Content Warnings and Sensitive Images
Content Warnings (CWs) are a feature of Mastodon that enable you to hide the body of a "toot" (post) behind a line of text. The intended use of this feature is to provide a way to discuss sensitive and/or potentially harmful topics without causing duress or harm to anyone who might stumble upon it, though it may be used for many other things.

Images can be marked as sensitive; this is a feature which hides an image until a warning banner is clicked. Images may be marked as sensitive separately from Content Warnings, though using a Content Warning automatically marks the toot's images as sensitive.

Clearly communicated and accurately labeled content warnings and sensitive image settings are required when having public conversations involving any of the following topics or content:

* Sexual or Adult content
* Detailed descriptions of harassment as outlined above in the definitions of harassment
* Political Commentary of any kind
* Drugs or Drug Use
* Advertisements for Corporations
* "Rage" toots and Toots using exclusively capital letters
* Excessively Long Toots (longer than ~15-20 lines)

In general, think about if what you are posting could cause people distress. Not the average person, mind. If a person could reasonably have PTSD or an adverse reaction, It's proper mastodon etiquette to place it behind a content warning.

#Staff
This instance is administered by the site owner, @aetaric. Additional moderation support provided by:

* DM @aetaric if you think you have qualifications worthy of being a moderator.

This is a place for musicians to interact, but you can bring your whole self.

You don't have to be a professional musician to join, but you should at least play an instrument or sing as a hobby.
