English Version of VIRA-LATA.org's Code of Conduct

VIRA-LATA.org is a Mastodon instance debo√≠sta, zen and Discordian. It is geared towards Brazilian people and Portuguese speakers. In summary, we embrace the chaos at ease.

This is not an animal rights activism instance. The term vira-lata(stray dog) is used as a metaphor for alternative people. But we welcome any animal rights activist that feels like being here.

This instance is moderated and the minimun age to take part is 18 years old.

We set out to be a democratic and progressive forum to promote chats, discussions, and positive experiences exchange. We embrace all the people in their plurality, and therefore, feminism, antiracism, ethnic, religious, and cultural diversity, as well as any initiative that promotes the dignity of human beings, mainly the least privileged ones.

To keep this space this way, all users from VIRA-LATA.org need to follow our code of conduct described below. If you think this instance is not for you, check out the suggestion of other instances for Portuguese speakers from our comrades from Mastodon(te)¬†or¬†the list of instances with rules similar to ours maintained by instances.noct.zone.

Our code was inspired by the code of conduct of the comrades of the Mastodon(te) instance and is aligned with the Community Covenant.

VIRA-LATA.org instance moderation rules summary for moderators of other instances:

Nudity without NSFW tag:NO
Nudity with NSFW tag:YES
Pornography without NSFW tag:NO
Pornography with NSFW tag:NO
Links to illegal content:NO
Spam:NO
Advertising:NO
Spoilers without content warning:NO

I. About the VIRA-LATA.org instance

I.1. Our moderation team

Our current moderation team is composed by @Leo.

I.2. Federation and instances with which we have restrictions

Because it is a decentralized and federated software, Mastodon servers (known as "instances"), can communicate with other instances and not communicate with others. (Learn more at Wikipedia:¬†Distributed social network, ActivityPub,¬†Fediverse¬†and Mastodon.)

The VIRA-LATA.org instance connects (federates) with the vast majority of the thousands of Mastodon instances, except those whose codes of conduct are incompatible with ours and/or whose moderators have repeatedly failed to take action regarding allegations of violation of the rules agreed in their codes of conduct. These exceptions can be seen in our list of blocks and silences available below in the section "Unavailable content".

I.3. Artistic attribution

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

I.4. Useful information

Follow @Leo and see the pinned toots for guides, news, and important information about the instance such as updates, and planned downtime.

I.5. Tips

Use the Mastodon Twitter Crossposter to get the content posted on the Mastodon to Twitter or vice versa. Remember to follow our policy on crossposters and set your audience to UNLISTED or PRIVATE. Do not leave retweets or quotes configured as PUBLIC at risk of having your account suspended.

info.short_description: A small, community for fans of speculative, science fiction and fantasy genres.
info.full_description:
We're a fresh Mastodon instance, set up in November 2022.

We're an inclusive community that welcomes all, as long as you're kind and respectful to others. We aim to provide an environment where you feel comfortable enough to participate freely. If you're not interested in that, there are plenty of other great instances to join.

What we're here for
We're here to discuss and build a community around speculative and fantasy genres. Want to discuss #RingsOfPower, #LOTR or #Tolkien? Ask the community. Interested in the best strategies for #Gloomhaven? We're all supportive here. Swap reviews, share your thoughts, find like minded folk to chat with. But, please follow widely in the Fediverse and boost posts on any topic or theme that interests you - let's build a broad and diverse group with an informative federated timeline.

Guidelines
In general, be good to each other. Enjoy talking to strangers (and friends!) on the internet, and give others the benefit of the doubt.

On commerce: if you are first and foremost engaged with the community, please feel free to also talk about any commercial work or projects. If you see any Green Dragon accounts that seem to be pure spam, please report them.

If problems arise, please use Mastodon's features to Block, Mute, or Report users that are causing problems. If you need more help, contact @SentientSpace.

Once you've joined
Introduce yourself! Communities like these work best when they're filled with strangers who talk to each other.

Then share yourself, your hobbies, interests, and whatever feels right. We chose the name Green Dragon because that's the environment we wanted to create: a homely, comfortable spot for chat and exchange of ideas. So don't be shy ‚Äî Jump into conversations you wouldn't normally join. Put your thoughts out to the community and see what can come from it.

To come:
Privacy Policy
Instance Status

A safe, reliable and distributed open source social network. It uses Mastodon and you can chat with thousands of people that are also part of other Mastodon networks (think of email).

UKSocial.Cloud aims to be a nice community of people, sharing and helping each You are welcome to join! The Rules are basic and hopefully acceptable for a community of good people.

MyGaming Network eine Mastodon Instanz f√ºr den Gaming und Allgemein Bereich.

Verhaltensregeln
Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfacher gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollst√§ndige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer L√∂schung von Toots und zu einer Blockung von Accounts f√ºhren k√∂nnen, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:

‚Ä¢ Bel√§stigung, Stalking, Doxxing

‚Ä¢ Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Bef√ºrwortung

‚Ä¢ Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren Bef√ºrwortung

‚Ä¢ Nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder F√∂rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus

‚Ä¢ Aufrufe zu Gewalttaten

‚Ä¢ Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling

‚Ä¢ Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung

‚Ä¢ Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder √ºberm√§√üige Werbung

‚Ä¢ Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

‚Ä¢ Kein Inhalt der illegal in Deutschland / √ñsterreich ist.

Bitte melden Sie Verhalten, das Sie st√∂rt. Das schlie√üt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit ingoranten Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Diese Verhaltensregeln basieren auf dem "About" von chaos.social verf√ºgbar in deren GitHub repository.
https://github.com/chaossocial/about

Backups
Aktuell wird einmal (1x) t√§glich ein komplettes Backup erstellt.

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance focused on food and wine. Mainly English. Hosted in the EU.
info.full_description:
We fully subscribe to and comply with the Mastodon Server Covenant. A number of instance blocks are implemented to comply with the principles of the covenant.

Detailed rules

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and the final interpretation is up to the epicure.social administrators; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies: The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline: Excessive advertising Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service: Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Casteism or advocation of casteism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism Spreading disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public health The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service: Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in Germany (where epicure.social is hosted) or the Netherlands (where epicure.social is registered), including holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviours: Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Media Retention

We currently keep local media files forever unless the user deletes them.

Donations

If this instance becomes popular and we need to scale up the hosting resources, we may start asking for donations to help with the running costs. For now, this is not necessary.

Bot Accounts

Bot accounts are allowed, but you need to set the toot visibility to unlisted and mark your accounts to Bot.

Blocked Countries

The following countries are banned due to mass spams: (this list will be updated as and when necessary)

Epicure Moderator Team

We are seeking moderators to help as this Mastodon instance grows. For now, moderation is handled by @morningclaret @simonjwoolf

# A Mastodon instance dedicated to Jpop!

If you are looking for a Twitter alternative and if you like talking about your favorite jpop artists and musics, you're in the right place! Feel free to create an account on this instance (or to follow us if you're already on another instance)

# Information about instance maintenance

This instance is maintained by only two people, so this is for now a very small infrastructure. We can only speak English or French, and a little bit Japanese, so we may be able to moderate content only in these languages. If the instance grows, we may call for moderators as well as donations if necessary.

# Content of this instance

Feel free to share anything you like! Of course, the main topic of this instance is jpop but it's not forbidden to publish a cat photo if you feel like it!
I (Sachiko) won't be in charge of creating regular content as long as Jpop world is vast and I'm mostly a J-idol enthusiast (particularly Hello!Project) so I'll probably share content only about them. That's why I'm counting on you to share YOUR favorite artists and songs to show to the world jpop variousness!

Welcome to mtgtalk.online, a Mastodon server/instance for everyone in the Magic: the Gathering community. 

By joining this server or migrating your existing account, you can easily connect with other MTG players, collectors, and fans. Don't worry, no topic restriction (within server rules) is enforced, so feel free to talk and post about anything and everything.

mtgtalk.online is fully federated, meaning that hosting your account here does not restrict you from following and interacting with Mastodon accounts hosted on other servers.

Please adhere to the server rules. Thank you!

(yeah, I know the server image is a mammoth and not a mastodon. I couldn't say no to that face!)

info.short_description: A French community instance
info.full_description:
Our goal is to provide a high availability instance targetted toward French and European users.

We are full RGPD compliant.

info.short_description: theradio.au
info.full_description: Like the radio used to be, this is a Mastodon instance for local creation conversations. If you're writing, podcasting, vlogging, filmmaking, photographing, recording, producing, or if you are consuming this awesome gear, theradio.au is the instance to be a part of.
